text: Stuart Charles Pearson (1934-2015), was a male boxer who competed for England. ==Boxing career== He represented England and won a silver medal in the -71 Kg division at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. He trained out of Doncaster Plant Works ABC and was the 1958 and 1959 Light Middleweight ABA champion. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:English male boxers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in boxing Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Boxers at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Light-middleweight boxers
